ⲏ Н N > hn > η ɑ̃ⁿ > ᴴEᴺ (sic greek/french)

alphabetic-change

ⲏ Н N > hn > η /ɑ̃ⁿ/ > E Eh < Ēta < •hĒta < •henta < •hemnta ⇔ ⲟ shun
Н ⲏ N > hn > η /ɑ̃ⁿ/ > H Ha < Han < •henta < •hemnta
η η > hn > /ɑ̃ⁿ/ > η < ἦτα ē̂ta < ŋta < •hngta < •hank ? 𒀭𒂗𒍪 *āńk ⋍ ήνη ŋƞɲɳ
ի ի > hn > iⁿ > i (as in ether)

H Ⲏ ⲏ 8 hĒta Η, η ē / e [eː] *huηn

Ϩϩ Hōri:djhour!

ⲏ Hune ⇔ ⲟ ŠUN often interchangable
